{"id":888009135,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1675072432,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/888009135/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"42.7 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {\n        ListNode ans = new ListNode();\n        ListNode temp = ans;\n\n        int carry = 0;\n        while(l1 != null || l2 != null || carry != 0){\n            int sum = 0;\n            if(l1 != null){\n                sum += l1.val;\n                l1 = l1.next;\n            }\n            if(l2 != null){\n                sum += l2.val;\n                l2 = l2.next;\n            }\n\n            sum += carry;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            ListNode cur = new ListNode(sum%10);\n            temp.next = cur;\n            temp = temp.next;\n        }\n        return ans.next;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false}
